t: r/ExpectationVsReality on Reddit: Actual product may not vary from the images shown on the package.
s: May 5, 2021 - No, in many countries things on the package don't look the same as inside. In Germany it's called "Serviervorschlag" (serving suggestion) where they're allowed to put other things or a different size on the package. The size fitting correctly in this video Ii's amazing.
